metadata.title: CVE-2013-1816 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
MediaWiki before 1.19.4 and 1.20.x before 1.20.3 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) by sending a speciallycrafted request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.4-1').
